name: Natural Connection
description:
Description:

A submission for the LostRelic Gam Jam 2022. Play as a cheeky monkey attempting to escape a stressful city without losing his cool, before Boss Gorilla can sentence him to expected overtime for the weekend.

Controls:

W,S,A,D - Movement                        MOUSE - Look                          SPACE - Jump

Status:

Incomplete draft build to ensure submission before the deadline - will try to update later. There is currently no sound or win/loss condition implemented, just a base enemy, platforming, and one boss.
